Butternut Squash Soup

07 Nov 2022

Made this a couple weeks before at my friend’s place and really loved how warm and soothing the soup was. I also wanted to try my hand at making homemade bread so I thought the two would go together pretty well. Really enjoyed this recipe and another plus is that one butternut squash makes quite a bit of soup.
